mapper.sql: order_id, item_id, item_guige, item_yanse, tuihuo_flg, guige_text, yanse_text, owner, shuliang, huodong_flg, price, status, msg_status, gongsi_id, wuliu_code, cost, lv00_lirun, lv01_lirun, lv02_lirun, del_flg, c_date, c_user, u_date, u_user
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_detail (order_id, item_id, item_guige, item_yanse, tuihuo_flg, guige_text, yanse_text, owner, shuliang, huodong_flg, price, status, msg_status, gongsi_id, wuliu_code, cost, lv00_lirun, lv01_lirun, lv02_lirun, del_flg, c_date, c_user, u_date, u_user ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemGuige,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemYanse,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tuihuoFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{guigeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yanseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shuliang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{huodongFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gongsiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lv00Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lv01Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lv02Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update t_order_detail
guige_text = #{guigeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yanse_text = #{yanseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shuliang = #{shuliang,jdbcType=INTEGER},
huodong_flg = #{huodongFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gongsi_id = #{gongsiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wuliu_code = #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lv00_lirun = #{lv00Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lv01_lirun = #{lv01Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lv02_lirun = #{lv02Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
c_date = #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
u_user = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and item_guige = #{itemGuige,jdbcType=INTEGER} and item_yanse = #{itemYanse,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tuihuo_flg = #{tuihuoFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}

update t_order_detail set guige_text = #{guigeText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yanse_text = #{yanseText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shuliang = #{shuliang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, huodong_flg = #{huodongFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg_status = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gongsi_id = #{gongsiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wuliu_code = #{wuliuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lv00_lirun = #{lv00Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lv01_lirun = #{lv01Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lv02_lirun = #{lv02Lirun,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, c_date = #{cDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_user = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_user = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and item_guige = #{itemGuige,jdbcType=INTEGER} and item_yanse = #{itemYanse,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tuihuo_flg = #{tuihuoFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select t1.order_id, t1.item_id, t1.item_guige, t1.item_yanse, t1.guige_text, t1.yanse_text, t1.owner, t1.shuliang, t1.huodong_flg, t1.price, t1.status, t1.gongsi_id, t1.wuliu_code, t1.del_flg, t1.c_date, t1.c_user, t1.u_date, t1.u_user, t2.item_id,t2.item_name,t3.path from t_order_detail t1 LEFT JOIN t_item t2 ON t1.item_id = t2.item_id INNER JOIN t_item_picture t3 ON t1.item_id = t3.item_id where t1.order_id=#{orderId} and t3.picture_type='3' and t1.tuihuo_flg='0'

select
from t_order_detail where order_id=#{orderId} and tuihuo_flg='0' order by item_id,item_guige,item_yanse

SELECT t1.order_id, t1.gongsi_id, t2.gongsi_name, t1.wuliu_code, t1.item_id, t1.item_guige, t1.item_yanse, t1.tuihuo_flg FROM t_order_detail t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN t_wuliu_gongsi t2 ON t1.gongsi_id = t2.gongsi_id WHERE t1.tuihuo_flg = "0" AND t1.status != msg_status ORDER BY t1.order_id, t1.gongsi_id, t1.wuliu_code
